entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 07 March 2023
